sentences.sContent: Yakutsk is the largest city in the world built on permafrost – soil that remains permanently frozen year round.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yakutsk is the largest city in the world built on permafrost – soil that remains permanently frozen year round.
sentences.sCn: 雅库茨克是世界上建设在永久冻土上最大的城市——土壤在全年都保持冰冻。

words.tran: 永久；耐久性；永久的事物

trans.tranOther: a layer of soil that is always frozen in countries where it is very cold
